intelligence.description: PSN hackers share the 'no info method' that is in use by @nich.legends to trick Sony support into flipping accounts - Screenshot 1
PSN hackers share the 'no info method' that is in use by @nich.legends to trick Sony support into flipping accounts - Screenshot 2

intelligence.markdown:
## US Support Vulnerability

Screenshots from Telegram and elsewhere suggest one method of account takeover involves a simple weakness in chat support procedures. The exploit has been censored here but it looks to be realistic.

Screenshot [#b111ef] describes the method by "Aw", and screenshot [#1b86ef] is some chatter from September last year between hackers confirming that this is one of the methods @nich.legends and his 'group' uses 'all day' to 'jack USA accounts'.

intelligence.description: Telegraph group announcing account reversions and successful account perma-bans (generated in revenge for account being reverted)
Connection to 'sinner' .. a reddit thread discussing SINNEonTelegraph who probes OG PSN accounts with family requests
Instagram post made by nice.legend wishing to employ female for social engineering
Instagram post made by nice.legend listing hacked accounts for sale
Telegram group sharing stolen account details including name, DOB, serial, credit card, email, and 2FA number
X post by @Hak00m_ showing a PlayStation Online Assistant offering to change account email in exchange for bitcoin
Telegram post listing stolen account 'Zzyuj' with full PII, credit card, serial, and instructions to social-engineer support

@nich.legends / Sinner threatens OG PSN account holder because he reverted his account. Subsequent to these threats the account was permanently banned by Sony for TOS violations (see telegram chat screenshot).

Telegram group listing 3 letter accounts for sale from Japan, UK and France.
Screenshot of someone using BTC to buy a PSN account from 'One Piece' receiving original email, password and two-step recovery code.
